Posts.Content: Sep 28, 2008 04:29AM schmeb wrote: Thank you for the info both of you and I will keep you posted.  I am not sure what the BRCA test is I will read up on it.  You would think with my family history I would know about all this...but guess I never really checked in to things.  I have always been healthy and I have been getting mammograms since I was 30.  Well I will ask more questions when I speak with my Doctor.  I will see how the mammo goes and take it from there.  Thanks for the support!!!  Deb
Posts.Title: Pain and Bloody discharge schmeb leaf

Posts.Content: schmeb wrote: Last month I went to ER because I thought I was having chest pains associated with a heart attack or something...but the only way to explain this pain was it was a dull achy feeling deep in my breast.  They did tests for my heart and everything was fine and I let it go and yesterday I noticed blood in my bra and checked my nipple on my right breast and sure enough if I squeezed my breast blood comes out..Now I  am thinkning that the achy pain I was having was something to do with my breast instead of my heart.....I have a mammo scheduled next Thursday but am wondering what anyone thinks.  What does breast pain feel like if you have breast cancer?  I dont feel a lump it just feels like a pain deep in my breast. My Mom had a double masectomy when she was 30 and I am 45 now.....I am worried but maybe I dont need to be I am confused Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pain and Bloody discharge schmeb leaf
